page.title: 12Inverkeithing Schools
page.content: In this area there are 4 primary schools:{ { {Inverkeithing Primary School}is situated in Roods Road. The main building was opened in 1917, but one section dates back to 1896. Roughly 600 pupils attend this school and there are about 30 staff. {Donibristle Primary}is an open-plan school situated on the top of a hill in the west of Dalgety Bay. It has about 468 pupils and 21 staff.It opened in 1978. {Dalgety Bay Primary School}was opened in 1969 and has 520 pupils and 20 teachers.The school,situated in St Bridget's Brae,has a Bronze Age burial chamber in it's grounds. {Park Road School}is in Park Road, Rosyth.The school was opened in 1926 and has 400 pupils and 30 staff.
